q1: Has Italy ever won the world cup?
a1: Yes, Italy has won the World Cup four times, in 1934, 1938, 1982 and 2006.
q2: all of this years Italy has won
q3: I think that they got complacent
a3: It's hard to get complacent when you've gone decades between wins.
q4: Does team Italy practice in Italy?
a4: The major training ground is in Florence.
q5: How often is the team able to practice with player commitments to their league clubs.
